newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: SICOM adjusts trading hours for coffee contract.
newsitem.headline: SICOM adjusts trading hours for coffee contract.

text.p: The Singapore Commodity Exchange (SICOM) said on Friday the trading hours of the robusta coffee futures contract will begin and end one hour later to adjust to winter time in Britain.

In a statement, SICOM said the morning session will start at 1000 (0200 GMT) and end at 1130 (0330 GMT) hours local time. The afternoon session will start at 1630 (0830 GMT) and end at 2030 (1230 GMT) hours.
The settlement prices will be available at 2130 (1330 GMT) hours, SICOM said.
